title: Laggy game leading to not being able to play league anymore.
body:
So yeah today the date 2017-10-25 is the day where I had a weird game the game lagged all of a sudden at like the second min and everyone was lagging and talking in all chat about it, so after a few mins like around the 10th min I got dced and probably everyone else, now after that it says reconnect and I thought yea let's just reconnect back in and it says error, and that i should check with my network so im like okay well I guess i have to wait the game out, and so i did I played Pubg with some friends came back 3 hours later wich is at the time im typing this and nothing nothing It still says reconnect i've tried reconnect about 100x times now and it says the same...

So... I reinstalled the game but nothing it still says the same thing and its not letting me escape the reconnect option.{{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}

replies.body: Yikes that's a REALLY long time for that game to have lasted. Have you been able to get that reconnect button to go away yet? If you're still having that problem go ahead and try a couple things for me really quickly. Update your Port forwarding and give your DNS settings a flush by following those steps in the [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues). Let me know if that helps at all or not.
